sn12.19:1.2: “Avijjanivaranassa, bhikkhave, balassa tanhaya sampayuttassa evamayam kayo samudagato.
sn12.19:1.3: Iti ayanceva kayo bahiddha ca namarupam, itthetam dvayam, dvayam paticca phasso salevayatanani, yehi phuttho balo sukhadukkham patisamvedayati etesam va annatarena.
sn12.19:2.1: Avijjanivaranassa, bhikkhave, panditassa tanhaya sampayuttassa evamayam kayo samudagato.
sn12.19:2.2: Iti ayanceva kayo bahiddha ca namarupam, itthetam dvayam, dvayam paticca phasso salevayatanani, yehi phuttho pandito sukhadukkham patisamvedayati etesam va annatarena.
sn12.19:3.1: Tatra, bhikkhave, ko viseso ko adhippayaso kim nanakaranam panditassa balena”ti?
sn12.19:3.2: “Bhagavammulaka no, bhante, dhamma, bhagavamnettika, bhagavampatisarana. Sadhu vata, bhante, bhagavantamyeva patibhatu etassa bhasitassa attho. Bhagavato sutva bhikkhu dharessanti”ti.
sn12.19:4.1: “Tena hi, bhikkhave, sunatha, sadhukam manasi karotha, bhasissami”ti.
sn12.19:4.2: “Evam, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhu bhagavato paccassosum.
sn12.19:5.1: “Yaya ca, bhikkhave, avijjaya nivutassa balassa yaya ca tanhaya sampayuttassa ayam kayo samudagato, sa ceva avijja balassa appahina sa ca tanha aparikkhina.
sn12.19:5.3: Na, bhikkhave, balo acari brahmacariyam samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn12.19:5.4: Tasma balo kayassa bheda kayupago hoti,
sn12.19:5.5: so kayupago samano na parimuccati jatiya jaramaranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
sn12.19:6.1: Yaya ca, bhikkhave, avijjaya nivutassa panditassa yaya ca tanhaya sampayuttassa ayam kayo samudagato, sa ceva avijja panditassa pahina, sa ca tanha parikkhina.
sn12.19:6.3: Acari, bhikkhave, pandito brahmacariyam samma dukkhakkhayaya.
sn12.19:6.4: Tasma pandito kayassa bheda na kayupago hoti.
sn12.19:6.5: So akayupago samano parimuccati jatiya jaramaranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi.
sn12.19:6.7: Ayam kho, bhikkhave, viseso, ayam adhippayaso, idam nanakaranam panditassa balena yadidam brahmacariyavaso”ti.
